Articles.Content:
I've just made a ship that can take off, fly around and land pretty damn good on Kerbin to be a heavy ship.

- It can not travel too far on Kerbin, but...

- It includes a full mining set (deposit tank, refinery and extractor) so you can refuel it almost everywhere (as long as you are under the sun), but it takes a lot of time to do so.

- Only one stage.

- It has not been tested by me outside Kerbin.

If you can improve it, go ahead.

Screenshot:

![shish_by_rusoski-d94cgxk.png](http://orig12.deviantart.net/8500/f/2015/217/a/d/shish_by_rusoski-d94cgxk.png)

Download:

[https://mega.co.nz/#!YQxFnaia!81jTrh1brHQMn0QCvefO6wf2A7-3P0H5iIQnWHqtVqw](https://mega.co.nz/#!YQxFnaia!81jTrh1brHQMn0QCvefO6wf2A7-3P0H5iIQnWHqtVqw)
